__TOC__

An update from the Forums Council for January of 2012

 1. New FC members. We had some turn over of the FC and thank the outbound members for their dedication and service and thank the incoming for their willingness to volunteer.

 1. Forms upgrade - The community would like to see a SSO for the forums and has formed a group of developers to work on a plugin for vBulletin.

 1. Hardware vendors requesting a sub forums were directed to establish a working relationship with Canonical first.

 1. The FC is reviewing ways we , the forums staff, can contribute Ubuntu Community Building, both with community interaction on and outside of the forums.

 1. We approved new Ubuntu Membership Applications - congratulations to all.
